text: It's a high-performance tablet with 128GB of space. We may earn a commission from links on this page. Deal pricing and availability subject to change after time of publication. Credit: Credit: Apple You can get this refurbished iPad Pro on sale for $599.99 right now with free shipping. The 12.9-inch 4th Gen is a high-performance tablet for drawing and designing, and it has an edge-to-edge Liquid Retina display with ProMotion technology (a 120Hz refresh rate), an A12Z bionic chip with a Neural Engine, and compatibility with the Apple Pencil 2 (not included). It comes with 128GB of space, ten hours of battery life, and a TrueDepth front camera with 4K recording from the rear camera. The tablet is in grade “A” refurbished condition, guaranteeing only light wear on the body and no scratches on the screen. You can get this refurbished iPad Pro 12.9” 4th Gen on sale for $599.99 right now with free shipping (reg. $1,299), though prices can change at any time and quantities are limited.

Credit: Credit: Apple

You can get this refurbished iPad Pro on sale for $599.99 right now with free shipping. The 12.9-inch 4th Gen is a high-performance tablet for drawing and designing, and it has an edge-to-edge Liquid Retina display with ProMotion technology (a 120Hz refresh rate), an A12Z bionic chip with a Neural Engine, and compatibility with the Apple Pencil 2 (not included). It comes with 128GB of space, ten hours of battery life, and a TrueDepth front camera with 4K recording from the rear camera. The tablet is in grade “A” refurbished condition, guaranteeing only light wear on the body and no scratches on the screen. 

You can get this refurbished iPad Pro 12.9” 4th Gen on sale for $599.99 right now with free shipping (reg. $1,299), though prices can change at any time and quantities are limited.
